winner_or_draw_predicted: The winner or draw is predicted
no_pred_for_match: There are no predictions for this match.
no_live_matches: There are no live matches yet.
signout_msg: Are you sure you want to sign out?
delete_acc_msg: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
app_desc: Experience the thrill of the world’s largest football fan tournament! Compete with fans worldwide in a one-of-a-kind challenge that puts your football knowledge to the test. Predict match outcomes, earn points, and rise through the ranks to become the ultimate football champion.
login_desc: Join the worldwide football prediction tournament!
award_msg: The top 20 players will be awarded at the end of the season.
conn_error: Please verify your internet connection and refresh.
unlock_ad_msg: Watch the ad to view predictions from other users!
predict_ad_msg: Finish watching the ad to submit your prediction!
predict_edit_ad_msg: Finish watching the ad to apply your prediction changes!
awards_info: Join the ultimate free football prediction tournament, open to fans from all over the world. Sign in, make your predictions, and climb the leaderboard by following the rules. At the end of the 2024/25 season, the top 20 players will be rewarded. For every point earned, you’ll receive $0.50, with your winnings transferred directly to you. Ready to compete? Welcome to el Torneo, where your football knowledge pays off!
rules_info: In el Torneo, scoring works as follows: Predict the exact score of a match to earn 3 points. If you correctly guess the winner or a draw, you’ll receive 1 point. However, if your prediction is incorrect, you will lose 1 point. Make your predictions wisely!
about_us_msg: We are a team of dedicated fans who cannot imagine their lives without football. el Torneo is a unique and completely free opportunity to test your football knowledge and win money, which will be awarded based on your points. We appreciate your understanding regarding the presence of ads in the tournament — this helps increase the prize pool. Your feedback and ratings on Google Play are extremely important to us. Feel free to share your impressions and suggestions. Hala Madrid, Visca Barça, You’ll Never Walk Alone at Stade de France!
supermatch_msg: These types of matches offer a unique opportunity to earn more points compared to regular games. The number of points awarded will vary.
quest_msg: This is a rare challenge. If you don’t make a prediction, you'll lose 2 points.
quest_match_msg: These rare matches require a prediction; otherwise, you’ll lose 2 points.
leagues_msg: League 1 is for early participants of el Torneo who have earned enough points to compete for top prizes and the championship title. New players or those with fewer points can join League 2, with the option to move up to League 1 at any time. However, only players with fewer than 20 points may transfer back from League 1 to League 2. Choose your league wisely, and welcome to el Torneo!
be_first: Be the first to join League
name: Name
err_username_len: Username must be at least 6 characters long.
err_password_len: Password must be at least 6 characters long.
err_name_len: Name must be at least 2 characters long.
signin_tg_msg: Open the Telegram bot and launch the el Torneo Web App. Copy the authentication code and paste it into the field below.
